shortdesc.ph: Preloads the specified audio effect to a specified channel.

p.codeblock: public int preloadEffectEx(RtcConnection connection, int soundId, String filePath);
virtual int preloadEffectEx(const RtcConnection& connection, int soundId, const char* filePath, int startPos = 0) = 0;

section.p: Each call to this method preloads one specified audio effect into memory. You can call this method multiple times to preload multiple effects. After preloading, you can call to play a specified effect, or to play all preloaded effects.

ul.li: To ensure smooth communication, limit the size of the audio effect file.
It is recommended to call this method before joining a channel.
To ensure smooth communication, limit the size of the audio effect file.
It is recommended that you call this method before joining a channel.
This method is applicable in multi-channel scenarios.
To ensure smooth communication, limit the size of the audio effect file.
It is recommended to call this method before joining a channel.

section.title: Scenario
section.p: This method is applicable in multi-channel scenarios.
When the method call succeeds, there is no return value; when fails, the exception is thrown. You need to catch the exception and handle it accordingly. See for details and resolution suggestions.

ul.props: bp cs electron native rn unity unreal
ul.li: < 0: Failure. See for details and resolution suggestions.
